caseTitle: Sardar Muhammad Naseem  Khan v. Returning Officer PP-12,etc
tagline: The amended election petition for all intents and purposes shall be a final, independent and separate document which had to be verified per the mandate of law. Once the original election petition was replaced and substituted by the amended election petition, the earlier could not be resorted to and it is not left to the choice of the appellant to fall back on the original election petition.
